data.name: Miners and Machines
data.detailed_description:
Become a prosperous gold miner in a world where gold waits under your feet!
Before you start to build your mine, drill and ground to check is that is it worth it!


Manage powerful machines like a dozer and excavator!
Build your own gold mine to successfully mine gold and don’t block yourself from working!
Buy new lands to make even more gold! There are local legends that you can find other precious stones on them…


You may find some difficulties on your way to gold, such as boulders and permafrost, upgrade your gear to scramble through!

Refuel your fuel tanks when fuel price is for a good price…
Try your hand at the public map and see if you can get more gold than other players!
Collect all of over 30 achievements!


We love contact with you, in case of any ideas, suggestions, problems with game, please write to us!
For backstage content, beta things, memes about game, check out our page, and social media!

data.short_description: Become a gold mine owner! Find gold in the ground, dig for it, and deliver it to the gold washing plant machine! Build your mining plant and manage machines which take a lot of fuel… Buy new lands and upgrades for your equipment! It’s a real gold fever!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese, Japanese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 GT
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
